item.title: How do i end my script when i press a buton
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

so like this :

begin SetUpSRL ClearDebug MainInitForm if(EndInitForm)then TerminateScript start; ActivateClient login MakeCompass('E') repeat cut check until(isfkeyDown(10)) if(isfkeyDown(10))then report terminatescript; end.??

item.source: How do i end my script when i press a buton

item.title: How do i end my script when i press a buton
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

He means make a repeat loop with what you want to do in it and in the until put IsFKeyDown(10);

If your holding F10 down when it does what’s in the repeat loop and is checking if the until condition is met(If you hold it down half way through whats in there, it won’t stop) then it tries to do a report then it stops the script

Read full topic

item.title: How do i end my script when i press a buton
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

It should work. Just something like this:

repeat; procedurename1; //name only! not procedure infront of it procedurename2; etc; until(IsFKeyDown(10)); report; terminatescript; end.

item.source: How do i end my script when i press a buton

item.title: How do i end my script when i press a buton
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Well you could put:

repeat
until(IsFkeyDown(10)) 
report;
terminatescript;

so you get a report when its all done. If you want the report to be repeated after every load/inventory full (whatever it is you’re doing) then it would be inside the repeats.

I’m pretty sure this fixed it.
Good luck

Read full topic
item.source: How do i end my script when i press a buton

edit:if i want my progress report too come up befor it ends do i put

repeat until(IsFkeyDown(10)) report;
or

repeat report; until(IsFkeyDown(10)) [br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2007, 05:17:58 PM[/size][hr]edit:i changed but it doesnt stop it just ignores me, my progress report still doesnt show up but it compiles?? i dont know whats wrong download the attachment and please tell me

item.source: How do i end my script when i press a buton

item.title: How do i end my script when i press a buton
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Or if you want it to be the same for every user (such as flash game button masher or something), you could place a repeat somewhere, and then tell the until

until(IsFkeyDown(5))

to keep repeating this until F5 is pressed. The same can be done with any other key.

Read full topic
